price: Mu by’ukuri Allah ni We Utanga amafunguro, Nyirimbaraga, Ukomeye bihebuje.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
